txt.en: 'Both Dervorin and Rossaran are safely returned. I have seen them with my own two eyes. How relieved I am!'
Aragorn has asked you to find Dervorin and Rossaran, both presumed to be missing in combat.
'Both Dervorin and Rossaran are safely returned.'
Aragorn can be found at his pavilion on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nYou should return to Aragorn now that Dervorin and Rossaran are found.
Search for Dervorin and Rossaran on the after-battle Pelennor.

'You appeared just in time. These Haradrim refused to surrender and, wearied as I am, I fear I might not have handled them on my own.\n\n'I must see my wife Bruidis again. It is what keeps me going. I shall meet you back at the pavilion, my friend.'
'Thank the stars. It is good to see you. Though I am pinned, I do not believe my leg is broken. If you would assist me, I should be able to make my way back.'
'Dervorin, son of Borhador, and Rossaran, a Swan-knight under Imrahil's command, are unaccounted for. You should search for them at once.'
